law.catch_line: When materials are sold in a package, the information statement shall be plainly printed on the pack...
law.text: When materials are sold in a package, the information statement shall be plainly printed on the package, or on a tag or label of a quality and fastened in a manner that it cannot be detached in handling. When materials are sold in bulk, the statement shall be delivered to the purchaser either with the invoice or with the materials.
